definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
La Comédie humaine, series of novels by 19th century French novelist Honoré de Balzac 巴爾扎克|巴尔扎克[Ba1 er3 zha1 ke4]

sentences.english: Anderson has the attitude for comedy, but not the aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 導演有對於喜劇片的態度，但是也許並不正確。

sentences.english: It is difficult for us to refrain from laughing when we are seeing a comedy.
sentences.chinese: 在我們觀看喜劇時，很難忍住不笑。

sentences.english: Now his darkly comic sensibility is penetrating a temple of high culture.
sentences.chinese: 而今他的黑暗的喜劇元素，進入了高雅文化的殿堂。

sentences.english: The sitcom single woman is never alone for long.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇中的單身女人從來不會獨身很久的。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, Zhou Libo's stand-up show has become a top event.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，周立波的單人喜劇表演引起轟動。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The popular comedy is the odds-on favorite to win the top film award this year.
sentences.chinese: 這部流行喜劇是贏取本年電影最高獎項的大熱門。

sentences.english: This is a light comedy and famous for the antiphonal singing of the spouses.
sentences.chinese: 這是一出小喜劇，以夫妻對唱而出名。

sentences.english: Some of Shakespeare's comedies are ended by a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的一些喜劇以有情人終成眷屬結束。

sentences.english: Yet he did not always take his cue from Thalia, the muse of comedy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他並不總是把他從塔利亞，繆斯的喜劇線索。

sentences.english: In the game of love, as in comedy, timing, they say, is everything.
sentences.chinese: 他們說愛情遊戲就跟喜劇一樣，時機的把握就是一切。

sentences.english: The situation comedy is going to start soon, just switch to channel one.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇馬上就要開播了，快調到一頻道。

sentences.english: There are 2 main categories for fictional television series, drama and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 美式電視劇分爲正劇和喜劇兩大類。

sentences.english: At the same time, another tragicomedy is played in the Imperial Palace of Tand Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，唐朝皇宮望仙台上，也上演着一幕悲喜劇。

sentences.english: But I enjoy other comedians, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 我也喜歡其他喜劇演員。

sentences.english: Action films and epics are for entertainment, as are comedies.
sentences.chinese: 動作電影和言情劇是娛樂大衆的，喜劇電影也一樣。

definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
